line: would you like some more coffee baby doll

tonight but do not say anything
and i just cannot hide it
about to lose control and i think i like it

because yknow she cries when they die and there is the whole funeral

garys gonna ask you to move in with him

he made me promise not to tell but i could not hold it in any longer

just handle it ask you to talk to him

you talk to him make him scared like you

because a lot less afraid of commitment than i used to be
still terrified take care of it

uh huh that is why they call it staten island

we are pretty good at this
oh i i i think that is the first time i ever missed a meal
yeah my pants are a little loose
all right listen umm i just bought something not sure she is gonna like it and it is gonna seem a little crazy but this is something that i wanted since i was a little girl
it is a it is a cat
i have to agree with joey on this one
but this is a purebred show quality sphinx cat
how much did you pay for that
well it was a little extravagant but i a pretty good deal
my grandmother had one of these when i was a little girl and it was the sweetest thing
i mean it was so cute it would sit in my lap and purr all day long and i would drag a shoestring on the ground and he would chase it
free cats do that too yknow
which reminds me if i might get a little political here support your local animal shelter
pet shops are not the place to buy dogs and cats from you get a much better deal from the shelter plus they probably will not die on you in a week and a half
if you want a leash go to the pet shop
if you want the dog for that leash go to the shelter and save it is life
now back to regularly scheduled programming
look you guys really excited about this
i do not care what you think

hey you wanna get something to eat or uh do you wanna see how long we can throw this ball back and forth

man i did not think we were gonna make it
what are you in here for
hey chandler what are you doing here
gary here to report a crime
it is a crime that you and i do not spend more time together
well i heard that you thinking about asking phoebe to move in with you and i thought maybe we should have a talk
if you live with phoebe you two are gonna be yknow live living together
i just know it would make me happy

i am trying to open your eyes my man
do not you see if you lived with phoebe she is always gonna be there
you are gonna get home she is there
you go to bed she is there
you wake up and oh yes she is there
were you are parents happy or something
listen chandler the way i see it is that i was lucky enough to find someone that i really love
i just i wanna be around her as much as i can
wow yknow when you say it it does not sound so scary
so you know what talking about right
you move in with her right now
maybe i should in with monica
no it is too soon for you guys
yeah you are right about that
now when they found the remains of the mesozoic mastodon they discovered what appeared to be the remains of a paleozoic amphibian in its jaws
maybe this should be more of a quiet game

it was right here where is it
all right come on late for work
you do not have a watch

monica whatever you do do not drop that ball
yeah we have not dropped it in
i not gonna be able to make it into work today i do not feel very good
uh for a second there i thought i was really better but not
congratulations that is quite a waste of time
you have scratches all over you what happened
oh yeah i got a cat
i do not want a cat
oh do not worry it is not a cat
you guys this cat is nothing like my grandmothers cat
i mean it is not sweet it is not cute i even dragged that little string on the ground and it just flipped out and scratched the hell out of me
and i swear i know this sounds crazy but every time this cat hisses at me i know it is saying rachel
does not sound as crazy as paying a thousand dollars for a cat
you paid a thousand dollars for a cat when you owe me 300
well i was gonna let you play with it
hmm did you talk to gary about the moving in thing
yes i did and i think you should do it
he is a great guy yknow
and he loves you a lot you are a very lucky lady
freaking out about commitment is the one thing you can do
and you cannot even do that right
if you ask me move in with him
get out of here good for nothing
hi can i talk to you for a second
yknow i really want to move this relationship forward
because if you are not moving forward yknow you are just moving backwards
if you are not moving forward you are just staying still
i want you to move in with me
but do not you think it is a little too soon
i mean there is so much we do not know about each other
oh oh okay i get it
i just i do not want us to jump into something we are not ready for
i really do not want to mess up what we have
just worried it is gonna be a big mistake
which is why my answer is yes
we are on the same team
you guys have been doing this for four hours
it is really a uh uh three person game yknow
whoa whoa you guys it is not a cat
i give up you guys i do not know what going to do with this thing

so why do not you just take it back to where you got it
they will not take her back
maybe that is because she is a minion of the anti christ
rach why will not they take it back
well they said would but they would only give me store credit
i mean what am i going to do get a thousand regular cats
look if you want you can keep it at our place until you find out what to do with it
no mon that is not the point
out a thousand dollars all scratched up and stuck with this stupid cat that looks like a hand
oh my god the cats made my eyes water
do not do not throw it to me
yeah you almost overreacted to something
well you are not more excited than i am
okay see you at the station later
do not forget about the moving in
so you are moving in with him
i could not tell him no
maybe it will be all right
i do really like him a lot and probably do it eventually anyway and plus think of all the money save on stamps
why do you write him a lot
no i just heard when people live together they split the cost of stamps
oh sorry the oven mitts really freaked me out
okay so did you find any apartments
no as soon as something opens up we will move right in
unless it does not have a pool i need a pool
phoebe can i talk to you for a second
because we are moving in together
so you uh you checked the paper for listings in brooklyn heights right
yeah uh huh there was nothing
because uh this is todays post and uh these are the listings i found
brooklyn heights brooklyn heights brooklyn heights
i thought people were just bragging
let me tell you what i think might be going on

okay i think somebody asked someone to move in with them
and i think someone said yes but now she is having doubts because things are moving to fast for someone
does that sound at all possible to you
you want me to say it
phoebe it is okay that you feel this way
and there is a lot of things we do not know about each other and i just figure that everything i really like
and the things i do not know i get to learn about at someplace with both our names on the mailbox
sweethart but none of that matters if it is too soon for you
we do not have to move in together
i just i want you to be happy
living with you would make me happy
phoebe you do not have to say that
no i really wanna live with you
i wanna move in with you
let us live in an apartment that we both live in
always wanted to say that when i was in one of these rooms which was never
what is wrong with your baby
it is actually it is very sweet
well so then what are you doing to me

i thought you wanted to adopt your cat

okay yeah i just wanted a cat
obviously you know how to haggle so not gonna try and take you on
so 800 and i do not call the cops because you are robbing me blind
just take cat leave the money and run away
cat cannot you at least smile or something

we are closing in on ten hours
i do not know who made you the boss
i made this game what it is

some kind of snake or something
